sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ObraService } from './services/obra.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit { title = 'TeatroSinFiltros'; shows: any[] = []; constructor(private obraService: ObraService) { } ngOnInit() { this.obraService.getObras().subscribe( (data) => { console.log(data); this.shows = data; }, (error) => { console.error('Error al obtener obras', error); } ); } } Teatro Sin Filtros
